page.title: 12Buildings
page.content: Houses in Rhymney,Pontlottyn and Fochriw are mainly miner's terraced cottages.Modern houses are detached, semidetached,flats and private bungalows.Recent council building has concentrated on old age pensioners complexes,like Saint David's Close in Rhymney,Mount Street in Pontlottyn and Bryn Nant in Fochriw.Redwood Memorial Hospital provides local nursing facilities and each village has a health and welfare clinic.The garages in Rhymney are Fosters and the Maerdy.Each community has its own Nursery and Primary Schools together with the Welsh School at Rhymney where the Comprehensive is also situated.The area has many Public Houses and Clubs which were supplied from a local brewery.
